results.title: Sometimes This Octopus Is So Mad It Just Wants to Throw Something
results.abstract: A study finds that the gloomy octopus — its real name — is in the small club of animals that toss things at other members of their own species.

results.title: Meta Lays Off More Than 11,000 Employees

results.title: The Secret to Great Thanksgiving Turkey Is Already in Your Fridge
results.abstract: A mayonnaise-based marinade gives this bird from J. Kenji López-Alt its gorgeous finish. Spatchcocking and a simple brining technique get it evenly cooked and juicy.

media.copyright: Christopher Simpson for The New York Times. Food Stylist: Simon Andrews. Prop Stylist: Paige Hicks.

results.title: Steven Spielberg Gets Personal
results.abstract: In making his autobiographical film “The Fabelmans,” he confronted some painful family secrets, as well as what it means to be Jewish in America today.

media.copyright: Chantal Anderson for The New York Times

results.abstract: Her use of what one critic called “a three-dimensional form that was neither painting nor sculpture” earned the kind of praise typically reserved in the 1960s for male art stars.

results.title: Scientists Say Concussions Can Cause a Brain Disease. These Doctors Disagree.
results.abstract: As another major medical institution acknowledged the link between concussions and the brain disease C.T.E., a group of scientists who guide many of sports’ top governing organizations dismissed the research at its conference.

media.caption: Of the nearly 7,500 recent research papers on concussions, scientists considered just 26 as they prepared to write their recommendations on brain injuries in collision sports.
media.copyright: Kieran Dodds for The New York Times
